title: Five Steps
description: SYNOPSIS: John lost his family in a freak accident; he found a memory chip on the location of the incident and decided to find out if those telephone numbers found on the chip have anything to do with the accident. The whirlwind journey took him to Okinawa, Lhasa, Kashmir, New York and Portland Island in UK. In the course of the journey, he learned to see things differently and achieved a lot more than it would have been possible otherwise. Read the book and find out what he had actually done during his time in those places and the life he had managed to change for others.
author: Tim I. Gurung
